source.68f17241:
# Graduate Admission
This kernel is my attempt to analyze the factors that play a key role in deciding whether you will be admitted to a graduate program based on your GRE SCore, CGPA etc.
source.45263caa: Higher your GRE Score, higher your chance of getting admiited.
source.93ccb6cb: Let's explore the relationship between the variable and see if they play a role in getting admitted to a college
source.58a87317: CGPA and GRE Score play a dominant role in deciding whether you will get admitted to a certain college.
source.23e8f17e: Above plot shows that students with higher GRE and TOFEL Score are more inclined to do research.
source.851b6927: Higher your TOFEL Score, higher your chance of getting admitted.
